definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Women's Road Champion Sun Qingjing early Yuan was in this comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 元初女道冠孙清静曾在此修真。

sentences.english: Ere such a soul regains its peaceful state.
sentences.chinese: 昨前如此灵魂重回清静守一之境。

sentences.english: We live in a quiet street in the city of Kowloon.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在九龙城一作清静街道。

sentences.english: It was still early when I returned home. The children were at school, my husband was at work and the house was quiet.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在上学，我丈夫在上班，家里清静得很。

sentences.english: The children were at school， my husband was at work and the house was quiet.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在上学，我丈夫在上班，家里清静得很。

sentences.english: She reseated herself in a quiet corner.
sentences.chinese: 她换了个清静的角落的座位坐下。

sentences.english: The air is crisp and clean, unlike this room.
sentences.chinese: 不像这屋子里，外面的空气新鲜又清静。

sentences.english: In the morning, this KFC was so quiet that we chatted here for more than one hour.
sentences.chinese: 早上的肯德基很清静，我们在这里胡侃了一个多小时。

sentences.english: The mood is difficult to be as involved as a meal drink a draught people quiet pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 情绪就难被牵扯着了饭照吃水照喝乐的一个人清静。

sentences.english: Go to the priests, then, and leave philosophers in peace!
sentences.chinese: 那么到牧师那里去把，让哲学家清静一些。

sentences.english: At home, his children recall, he prized the solitude of his lawnmower.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们回忆道，在家的时候，他挺羡慕剪草工的清静。

sentences.english: Here trees are luxuriantly green, green, green grass, quiet elegance.
sentences.chinese: 这里绿树葱茏，碧草如茵，清静幽雅。

sentences.english: I'll have a quiet day and I'll soon get better. " his wife told him.
sentences.chinese: 今天我将清静一下了，我很快就会好点的。

sentences.english: It will calm your mind through meditation and self-questioning.
sentences.chinese: 通过冥想和自我探询，将使你的头脑感到清静。

sentences.english: His house was situated in a very peaceful block in Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 阿廖沙的家坐落在莫斯科市一个十分清静的街区。

sentences.english: But I won't tweet , won't perturb you from the peace.
sentences.chinese: 但我不会鸣叫，不会打扰你的清静。

definition: lit. ears pure and peaceful (idiom)/to stay away from the filth and unrest of the world
(of a location) quiet and secluded/beautiful and secluded
to cultivate the heart and nurture the character (idiom); to improve oneself by meditation
Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
